Scripts.OnEnter:
getglobal(this:GetName().."SubText"):SetTextColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b) ATSW_DisplayRecipeTooltip()
local Texture = getglobal(this:GetName().."Texture"):GetTexture() local Highlight = getglobal(this:GetName().."Highlight")
if Texture then Highlight:Show() else Highlight:Hide() end

getglobal(this:GetName() .. "Text"):SetTextColor(1, 1, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMRIGHT")
local Index = ATSW_GetPositionFromGame(this.Name)
if ATSW_TradeSkill() then GameTooltip:SetTradeSkillItem (Index) else GameTooltip:SetCraftSpell (Index) end

GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMRIGHT")
local RecipeIndex, ReagentIndex = ATSW_GetPositionFromGame(ATSW_RecipeSelected()), this:GetID()
if ATSW_TradeSkill() then GameTooltip:SetTradeSkillItem (RecipeIndex, ReagentIndex) else GameTooltip:SetCraftItem (RecipeIndex, ReagentIndex) end
CursorUpdate()
if this.Position then RTexture = getglobal(this:GetName() .. "QualityTexture")
RTexture:SetVertexColor(1, 1, 1) RTexture:Show() end
Scripts.OnLeave:
GameTooltip:Hide() ResetCursor()
RTexture = getglobal(this:GetName() .. "QualityTexture")
if this.R and this.G and this.B and not (this.R == 1 and this.G == 1 and this.B == 1) then RTexture:SetVertexColor(this.R, this.G, this.B) else RTexture:Hide() end
Scripts.OnClick:
local RecipeIndex, ReagentIndex = ATSW_GetPositionFromGame(ATSW_RecipeSelected()), this:GetID() local Link
if ATSW_TradeSkill() then Link = GetTradeSkillReagentItemLink(RecipeIndex, ReagentIndex) else Link = GetCraftReagentItemLink(RecipeIndex, ReagentIndex) end
ATSWRecipe_OnClick(Link)
if this.Name ~= ATSW_Profession[ATSW_player] then CastSpellByName(this.Name) else this:SetChecked() end

if ATSW_TradeSkill() then CloseTradeSkill() else CloseCraft() end
PlaySound("igCharacterInfoClose")

Scripts.OnTextChanged:
local text = this:GetText()
ATSW_SetSearch(text)
if text ~= "" then ATSWSearchBoxClear:Show() ATSWSearchLabel:Hide() ATSWSearchIcon:Hide() else ATSWSearchBoxClear:Hide() end
Scripts.OnEditFocusLost:
local text = this:GetText()
this:HighlightText(0, 0)
if text ~= "" then ATSWSearchLabel:Hide() ATSWSearchIcon:Hide() else ATSWSearchLabel:Show() ATSWSearchIcon:Show() end

Scripts.OnClick: if ATSWSearchHelpFrame:IsVisible() then ATSWSearchHelpFrame:Hide() else ATSWSearchHelpFrame:Show() end

Scripts.OnVerticalScroll: if ATSWListScrollFrameScrollBar:IsVisible() then ATSW_ScrollOffset[ATSW_player][ATSW_Profession[ATSW_player]] = ATSWListScrollFrameScrollBar:GetValue() FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(ATSW_TRADESKILL_HEIGHT, ATSW_UpdateRecipes) end

Scripts.OnEnter:
if ATSW_RecipeSelected() then GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMRIGHT")
local RecipeIndex = ATSW_GetPositionFromGame(ATSW_RecipeSelected())
if ATSW_TradeSkill() then GameTooltip:SetTradeSkillItem (RecipeIndex) else GameTooltip:SetCraftSpell (RecipeIndex) end
CursorUpdate() end

Scripts.OnClick:
this:Hide()
ATSWPreviousItemButton_OnClick()
if table.getn(ATSW_PreviousRecipes[ATSW_player][ATSW_Profession[ATSW_player]]) > 0 then this:Show() end

Scripts.OnTextChanged:
ATSW_UpdateCreateButton()
if this:GetNumber() == 0 then ATSWAmountBox:SetText(ATSW_ALL) elseif this:GetNumber()>100 then this:SetNumber(100) end
ATSW_Amount[ATSW_player][ATSW_Profession[ATSW_player]] = this:GetNumber()

Scripts.OnHide:
if ATSW_SwitchingToEditor then ATSW_SwitchingToEditor = false else if ATSW_TradeSkill() then CloseTradeSkill() else CloseCraft() end
PlaySound("igCharacterInfoClose") end
ATSWUpdaterFrame:Hide()

Scripts.OnClick:
if this:GetChecked() then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn") ATSW_Unified=true ATSWOFSeparateButton:SetChecked(false) end
if ATSWFrame:IsVisible() then ATSW_UpdateRecipes() end
this:SetChecked()

if this:GetChecked() then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn") ATSW_Unified=false ATSWOFUnifiedButton:SetChecked(false) end
if ATSWFrame:IsVisible() then ATSW_UpdateRecipes() end
this:SetChecked()

if this:GetChecked() then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn") ATSW_ConsiderBank=true else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff") ATSW_ConsiderBank=false end
if ATSWFrame:IsVisible() then ATSW_UpdateRecipes() end

if this:GetChecked() then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn") ATSW_ConsiderAlts=true else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff") ATSW_ConsiderAlts=false end
if ATSWFrame:IsVisible() then ATSW_UpdateRecipes() end

if this:GetChecked() then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn") ATSW_ConsiderMerchants=true else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff") ATSW_ConsiderMerchants=false end
if ATSWFrame:IsVisible() then ATSW_UpdateRecipes() end

if this:GetChecked() then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn") ATSW_AutoBuy=true else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff") ATSW_AutoBuy=false end
if ATSWFrame:IsVisible() then ATSW_UpdateRecipes() end
if this:GetChecked() then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn") ATSW_RecipeTooltip=true else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff") ATSW_RecipeTooltip=false end
if this:GetChecked() then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn") ATSW_DisplayShoppingList=true else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff") ATSW_DisplayShoppingList=false end

Scripts.OnLoad: this.small = 1 this.info = {} this.info.collapse = true this.info.showSmallerCoins = false
